name: SleepSounds
0:
”Alexa, open sleep sounds”
”Alexa, start sleep sounds”
”Alexa, launch sleep sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep sounds
des: Welcome to Sleep Sounds, your ultimate companion for a peaceful night's rest. Immerse yourself in a world of tranquility with a curated collection of soothing sounds designed to lull you into a deep and restful sleep. From gentle raindrops to whispering winds, each sound is carefully selected to create a serene ambiance that promotes relaxation and rejuvenation. Simply ask Alexa to play your favorite sound, set a timer, and drift off to dreamland effortlessly. Say goodbye to restless nights and hello to a blissful sleep experience with Sleep Sounds. Sweet dreams await.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
